snippet: New releases include those by Lianne La Havas, Opossom, Blonds, Jovanotti and the soundtrack to “Sparkle,” with Jordin Sparks and Whitney Houston.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews Lianne La Havas debut album Is Your Love Big Enough, Opossom's Electric Hawaii, The Bad Ones recording from Blonds, Jovanotti debut compilation Italia 1988-2012, and the Sparkle film soundtrack, featuring Jordin Sparks and Whitney Houston.
lead_paragraph: New releases include those by Lianne La Havas, Opossom, Blonds, Jovanotti and the soundtrack to “Sparkle,” with Jordin Sparks and Whitney Houston.

headline.seo: New Music by Lianne La Havas, Jovanotti, Blonds and Opossom
headline.main: Longing and Swooning Around the Globe
headline.print_headline: Longing and Swooning Around the Globe
